name: Quotation Comparison
query:
SELECT
sq.supplier as "Supplier:Link/Supplier:150",
sq.name as "Supplier Quatation:Link/Supplier Quotation:100",
sq.transaction_date as "Date:Date:100",
sqi.item_name as "Item:Data:150",
sqi.item_code as "Item Code",
i.item_group as "Item Group",
i.category as "Category",
i.item_sub_group as "Item Sub Group",
sqi.uom as "UOM:Link/UOM:50",
sqi.qty as "Quantity:Float:100",
sqi.amount as "Price:Currency:100",
sqi.stock_uom as "Stock UOM:Link/UOM:50",
sqi.rate as "Price Per Unit:Currency:100",
sqi.warehouse as "Warehouse",
sq.payment_term as "Payment Terms:200"


FROM
`tabSupplier Quotation` sq, `tabSupplier Quotation Item` sqi , `tabItem` i

WHERE
sqi.parent=sq.name and 
i.item_code = sqi.item_code and
i.item_code=%(item)s
